characters.story: An striking symbol for an echo that whispers "Shyahng" softly!
A striking symbol for section that shouts "Dwahn!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
"Dwahn!" Metal sections commanded sharply to forge - tempering what was wrought!
This character represents unreal, shouting "Hwahn!" sharply!
See how the mouth forms to take charge of? It sings "Suh!" cheerfully!
The strokes unite to show word, asking "Tsuh? Phrase?" curiously!
This character represents boat, singing "Joh!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show ship, asking "Chwahn? Vessel?" curiously!
"Bahn!" Two boats sang cheerfully - one sort, kind, class of carrier!
A striking symbol for tray that asks "Pahn? Plate?" curiously!
"Bahn!" The hand sorted things cheerfully to relocate - moving, shifting, transferring like a conveyor!
Picture melon taking form - it sings "Gwah!" with vivid energy!
